name: Punch Dice
description:
Team TIMO presents...

PUNCH DICE

"You were playing  D&D when rolled a dice only to find out he was magical! 

Now punch the dice away to escape back to reality!

But be careful: you can only punch the dice so many times and each side holds good fortune or bad luck!"

---

  • WASD - Run
  • Space bar - Jump
  • Left Mouse click - Attack
